org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.artist

Class ArtistsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.commons.adt.ObservableListManager<E>
      • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.commons.adt.ObservableFileListManager<MusicArtistObservableFileWrapper>
        • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.artist.ArtistsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListListener<MusicArtistObservableFileWrapper>, ObservableListListener<MusicArtistObservableFileWrapper>

    public class ArtistsManager
extends ObservableFileListManager<MusicArtistObservableFileWrapper>
    Manager responsible for keep in memory the details of the existing artist on the disk.

    Since this manager is a ObservableFileListManager, it handles the changes to the artists by save their details to the disk and load the saved files when needed.

      • newFileWrapper

        public MusicArtistObservableFileWrapper newFileWrapper(java.io.File f)
        Description copied from class: ObservableFileListManager

        The initialization of the object (probably) should be depended from the content or the name of the file.
